description.fr: Vaincre tous les Tofus. \--- DÉBUT DE COMBAT et {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Tous les Tofus prennent leur {PropertyEffect:15[ENVOL]}.
description.en: Defeat all the Tofus. \--- START OF FIGHT and {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} All the Tofus take {PropertyEffect:15[FLIGHT]}.
description.es: Vencer a todos los tofus. \--- INICIO DEL COMBATE y {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Todos los tofus {PropertyEffect:15[LEVANTAN EL VUELO]}.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Tofus. \--- INÍCIO DE COMBATE e {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Todos os Tofus levantam {PropertyEffect:15[VOO]}.
